alert.note: Alert for Dallam (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 24 at 7:10PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Cimarron and western Dallam Counties through 800 PM CDT... At 710 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 5 miles east of Clayton to 4 miles west of Sedan. Movement was northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Texline, Ware and Felt. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for the Panhandle of Oklahoma...and the Panhandle of Texas.
